hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARAMETER_UNIQUE_JOB_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the tag for the base os images

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARAMETER_REPO_IDENTIFIER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
A keyword to identify the directory to which the code repository will be cloned and from which packages will be built.
Constructed into a full path like this: /jenkins_output/<PARAMETER_REPO_IDENTIFIER>/<BUILD_ID>

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARAMETER_IRODS_PACKAGES_ROOT_DIRECTORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Full path to top-level directory which holds built iRODS packages

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: PARAMETER_IGNORE_CACHE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If the target directory already exists and is not empty, it will be removed. If not, the directory will be left alone and the clone will be skipped.
